attributes.action:
THE PEOPLES VOTED 
reject a second referendum on leaving/staying in the eu
attributes.additional_details:
regarding the politicians who are screaming for a peoples vote,well,the people have VOTED and have choosen to leave.if there does happen to be a "peoples vote",then,the question on the ballot paper should read
in 2016 the people of the united kingdom choose to leave the E.U.now that we are leaving,
do you accept the governments brexit deal.?tick one box only.
YES ⬜   
NO   ⬜
attributes.background: in 2016 the people of the uk were asked to vote leave/stay in the eu and the majority choose to leave.
